title: The Beast
description: When a group of strangers come together to work at Camp Hero in Montauk, they uncover a plot that has its genesis back in the mists of time. A plot that would lead to the dessimation of a large part of the worlds population and the control of time itself. They have to face their own fears and darkness within to deal a blow against the controllers of the past and masters of a dystopian future.
author: Andrew Scorah
